title: Synthetics. Volume 3
brief_description: Volume 3 of a 4 volume CD-ROM collection of material compiled by Stephen Jones for the exhibition formally known as Synthetics. Content is arranged in folders and as a collection of texts, images and hypertexts. The folders contain material relating to the work of Warren Burt and the general Synthetics website. (see: Documentation for details)
